rules_text:
Choose two –
• Each opponent sacrifices a nontoken creature.
• Each opponent sacrifices a nontoken artifact or enchantment.
• Each opponent sacrifices a nontoken planeswalker or battle.
• Return a permanent card in a graveyard that was put there this turn to the battlefield under your control.
